sub_fields.title: Category Questions
sub_fields.description: Answer the following questions to determine the eligibility of your proposal.

sub_fields.title: Who you’re targeting, how you’ll reach them, and why this matters for Cardano?
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer: We want to target all the Cardano projects and community members interested in the long-term survival of Cardano-related projects, just like the product of a project, other factors, like its legal structure and relation with its related parties, can have a significant impact on the survival and performance of a project, so the project that wans launch on cardano or a person who wants to invest in a new project arving, they should not only consider prducty project, its tokenomics and other thigs, but should also consider the legal structure of the entit

sub_fields.title: Provide a list of key activities of your project:
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer: We will include the type of company structures that are prevalent in the traditional markets, and delve into the entity structures that are coming on Cardano, to provide a comparative analysis of crypto entity structure, give a brief Situation in the form of Pros and Cons, its significance and effect on the project based on lifrstule

sub_fields.title: What are your success metrics?
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer: Proper identification of the relevant company structure gives a holistic view of the same, irrespective of the country-specific rules, and gives a significant knowledge base of information on Cardano.

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer: We will provide the Cardano community with highly professional educational material to help them learn the pros and cons of particular types of entity structure and gage their impact on the lifecycle of the project

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer: With these educational modules available for the community, the projects on Cardano can maintain better entity structure and get better access to safety and a higher level of thrust from the community!

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
With over 10 years of experience as a Chartered Accountant specialising in financial reporting, technical accounting, IFRS, Ind AS, hedge accounting, and GAAP conversions, I bring a strong foundation of professional discipline, compliance, and accountability to this project. I have led complex financial reporting and consolidation processes across industries such as renewable energy, manufacturing, and financial services, ensuring strict adherence to regulatory standards and accurate representation of financial information. My background in assurance and financial reporting advisory has equipped me with the capability to guide organisations through intricate accounting challenges while maintaining the highest standards of transparency and trust.

These capabilities position me well to deliver this project, which focuses on improving the financial reporting quality across Cardano ecosystem projects. I have a proven track record of designing and implementing accounting frameworks, managing large-scale GAAP conversion initiatives, and developing automated and efficient reporting processes. My work consistently involves collaborating with CFOs and senior stakeholders, reinforcing my ability to manage funds responsibly and communicate clearly with all parties involved.

To ensure the feasibility and effectiveness of this approach, I will validate the framework by putting the entity structure education material to catalyst use, testing the clarity, usability, and completeness of the educational material before publishing it.. By combining technical expertise, professional ethics, and structured validation steps, I can deliver this project with a high degree of reliability, accountability, and trustworthiness.

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer:
We will collect all the corporate structures and inter-entity structures identified for the projects in the Cardano ecosystem, giving their pros and cons and effect on the token,



(The difference between milestone 1 & 2 is ihat in M1 we are only dealing with single entity and its types, and in milestone 2 we are dealing with the combinations of the entities identified in the m1 ie a group of entities.)

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer: This project delivers strong value for money because it creates openly accessible, example-based entity structure education that Cardano projects can use to improve their entity structure without paying for external consultants. By producing reusable modules, clear standards guidance, and practical examples for the entire ecosystem, a relatively small budget helps raise transparency, compliance, and financial maturity across many projects—not just one—making the impact broad, long-lasting, and cost-efficient.
